label: microwave
shortElderly: This is a microwave. Put food inside, close the door, set time, then press Start. Do not put metal inside.
shortChild: This warms up food. Don’t touch it when it’s hot. Ask an adult to use it.

label: sunflower
shortElderly: This looks like a sunflower. It is a common garden plant that follows sunlight.
shortChild: Sunflowers are big yellow flowers. They like the sun a lot!
